welcome_page.title: Welcome to injixo Forecast
welcome_page.introduction: Almost there! Before you can use the injixo Forecast, a workload needs to be created. Workloads are the heart of your forecast. They contain all your historical data and related forecasts in one place. Without them, no forecast can be generated.
welcome_page.introduction_workload: The cards below show a summary of your current injixo Forecast setup. To use workloads, the correct setup of your ACD connection and the availability of imported queues is required. You can click on blue cards now to continue.

unchecked.desc: To use forecast, you need to connect an external system to injixo.

invalid.desc: Your credentials have been rejected by the ACD. Please ensure you provide valid credentials.

queue.title: Import Queues
queue.delay_warning: It can take several minutes before the historical data is available for the forecast.

description.xlink: Available historical data was successfully imported.
description.general: Imports will continue on a regular basis.

disabled.desc: To import queues you need an ACD connection first.
Make sure queues are available in order to create a workload.

checked.desc: You already have workloads in your system. Browse here.

unchecked.desc: Create a workload to start forecasting.

integrations.body: If you want to connect your ACD to import queues, create a new integration. Select from one of the external systems, or use our universal interfaces.

with_history.body: You are just a few clicks away to have your Auto-Forecast up and running. Create your first workload and use your historical data.

not_configured.headline: Staff Requirement calculation is not yet configured.

configuration.other_info: You can set the parameters for the following "other" calculation methods in the dialog on the forecast page.

pu_help.text: Parent Planning Units are not selectable.

configuration.use_workload_pu: Use the staff requirements for the planning unit and the activity set in the workload configuration

requirement_calculation.max_sessions_info: The maximum amount of parallel chat session one agent can have at the same time.

overhead.out_of_range: Only enter a whole number from 0 to 99.

error.shrinkage: Only enter a whole number from 0 to 99.

min_agents.too_high: Minimum must be below Maximum ({{ max }}).

max_agents.too_low: Maximum must be greater than Minimum ({{ min }})

requirement_calculation.overhead_info: The percentage of the AHT that an agent must spend on tasks that they cannot do in parallel (such as adding notes to the CRM).

not_based_on_forecast.link: Calculations for Multiactivity, Constant Requirement and Outbound

explanation_list.multiactivity: For multiactivities, transfer the forecasts of all subactivities first and use the “Auto-Forecast” version in the script.
explanation_list.constant: No forecast is needed to calculate constant requirement.
explanation_list.outbound: For the calculation of outbound requirement, a forecast is optional.
explanation_list.multiple_planning_units: The Multiple Planning Units script uses Erlang C to distribute staff requirements over one or many Planning Units.

not_based_on_forecast.link_with_additional_saferun_and_mpu_scr: Calculations for Multiactivity, Constant Requirement, Outbound and Multiple Planning Units
not_based_on_forecast.link_with_mpu_scripts: Calculations for Constant Requirement and Multiple Planning Units

card.body: For a correct calculation result, the forecast for the desired period must be exported ("Use Forecast" button) before the employee requirement is calculated.
card.auto_forecast: The Forecast version must then be selected in the script.
card.hint: Save your time and make use of the new automatic

requirement_calculation.no_forecasted_aht: To use forecasted AHT all your queues must have complete AHT data.

unsupported_timespan_error.title: Staff Requirement Calculation is not available in yearly view.
unsupported_timespan_error.description: Please choose daily, weekly or monthly view.

no_forecasted_elements_error.title: Staff Requirement Calculation is not available for days without a forecast.

status.failed: Transferring Staff Requirements failed due to an internal error. Please try again.
status.connection_error: Connection to WFM failed. Please try again.

timezone_mismatch.failed: The time zone of the workload must be the same as the time zone of the planning unit.

target_invalid.failed: Transferring Staff Requirement failed for the selected timeframe. Check the validity of the Activity within this Planning Unit in WFM and try again.
target_invalid.one_day: Transferring Staff Requirement was successful on all valid days. On {{ one }} the Activity is not assigned to the Planning Unit and the transfer did not occur.
target_invalid.two_days: Transferring Staff Requirement was successful on all valid days. On {{ one }} and {{ two }} the Activity is not assigned to the Planning Unit and the transfer did not occur.
target_invalid.three_days: Transferring Staff Requirement was successful on all valid days. On {{ one }}, {{ two }} and {{ three }} the Activity is not assigned to the Planning Unit and the transfer did not occur.
target_invalid.many_days: Transferring Staff Requirement was successful on all valid days. On {{ one }}, {{ two }}, {{ three }} and {{ numberRest }} more days the Activity is not assigned to the Planning Unit and the transfer did not occur.

export_modal.title: Transfer Staff Requirement to SchedulePro
export_modal.saving: To use the staff requirements during the planning process, you need to save them first.
export_modal.overwrite_hint: Existing staff requirements for this timeframe will be overwritten.
export_modal.other_algorithm: In order to use a different calculation algorithm, you have to transfer the Forecast through the "Use Forecast" button in the Volume and AHT section.

modal.heading: Adjust Parameters for Staff Requirement Calculation
modal.description: You can adapt the parameters for the requirement calculation.

error.aht: Only enter a whole number greater than 0.
error.service_level: Only enter a whole number from 1-99.
error.target_answer_time: Only enter a whole number greater than 0.

requirement_calculation.shrinkage_info: Enter a number greater than 0 to account for unplanned breaks (e.g. restroom breaks). Leave the number at 0 if you do not want to account for shrinkage.
requirement_calculation.overhead_explanation: If you enter 1 for Maximum sessions, the Overhead parameter will have no effect.
requirement_calculation.use_fixed_aht_as_fallback_only: Apply the fixed AHT only when no AHT value is available

warnings.workload_mismatch: Your configuration differs from the settings you selected on the edit workload page.

forecast_version.saving_error: Forecast could not be stored in Version. Please try again.

selection.title: Save the data in this forecast version:

modal.info: Already existing data in this time frame will be overwritten in the selected version.

selection.data: Select the data you want to download.

forecast_import.title: Import forecast data

errors.empty_file: The file is empty. Try re-exporting it or upload a different file.
errors.end_time_before_start_time: The end time cannot be before the start time.
errors.error_on_line: We have found a mistake in line {{line_number}}:
errors.excessive_data: The file can include up to one year of data.
errors.file_too_large: The file you tried to upload is too big. The maximum size is 7 MB.
errors.invalid_channel: This channel type is not supported. We support calls, emails, chats, documents, cases, social_media.
errors.invalid_date_format: The dates in the file must follow the format YYYY-MM-DD.
errors.invalid_date_or_time_format: The dates in the file must follow the format YYYY-MM-DD. The times must follow the format HH:MM.
errors.invalid_duration_cdr: The contact is set as handled but there is no duration for it.
errors.invalid_end_of_line: All lines in the file must have the same end-of-line characters as the first line.
errors.invalid_handled_cdr: The handled field must contain the value 0 or 1.
errors.invalid_headers: All headers must follow the format: "Timestamp;Offered;AHT (standard format)" or "Timestamp;Offered_customtext;AHT_customtext (custom text with mandatory underscore)".
errors.invalid_number: Numeric values must be whole numbers or decimal numbers separated by a point (e.g. 1.5).
errors.invalid_row_length: All lines must have the same amount of fields as the header line.
errors.invalid_separator: The separator must be a comma (,) or a semicolon (;).
errors.invalid_time_format: The times in the file must follow the format HH:MM.
errors.invalid_timestamp: The timestamp does not match the interval length.
errors.negative_number: Numeric values must be positive numbers.
errors.non_existing_timestamp: The specified local time does not match an existing timestamp. This may be due to a time change.
errors.number_too_big: The number is too big. Correct your data or contact our support team for assistance.
errors.string_too_long: The field can be up to 255 characters.
errors.unexpected: An unexpected error has occurred. Check your data or try to upload the file again.
errors.unknown_error: An unknown error occurred. Check your data or try to upload the file again.
errors.invalid_time_range: The data exceeds the maximum period of 10 years.

forecast_import.select_file: Select the CSV file you want to import.

missing_queues.title: Missing Queues
missing_queues.description: Missing queues are the result of incorrect value types. In order to use the missing queues in Forecast, it is necessary to set the value types according to the following table:

table.tooltip_required: All value types of this column must be assigned to a Queue in WFM.
table.tooltip_optional: If assigned to a Queue in WFM, these value types will also be available.
table.tooltip_other: If assigned, these value types are ignored during import. Further value types prevent a Queue from being available.

social_media_other_value_types.speed_of_answer: Social Media Average Speed of Answer

missing_queues.wfm_hint: After changing a Value Type in WFM it might take several minutes before the updated Queues are available in Forecast.

status.none: No integrations have been set up.

mode.is_live: This workload is in Live mode and charged for monthly.
mode.description_test: This workload is currently in Test mode. To use all functionalities of injixo Forecast, switch this workload to Live mode. Live workloads are billed additionally. You cannot switch a Live workload back to Test mode.

workloads.holiday_section_description: The forecast is adjusted based on the holiday region and historical trends for each public holiday.

errors.different_intervals: Queues with different interval lengths cannot be merged. Choose queues with the same interval length.

delete.label: Delete workload

modal_list.header: The workload <bold>{{ workload_name }}</bold> will be deleted.
modal_list.billing: The workload will still be billed until the end of the current month.

aht.label: AHT
aht.label_tooltip: AHT is available for queues that have the value types "{{ channel }} Answered" and "{{ channel }} Average Handling Time" assigned in WFM.
aht.info: Set a fixed AHT if you cannot or don’t want to work with the forecasted AHT.

edit.target_answer_seconds_aria_label: Target average speed of answer in seconds

new.title: New workload
new.queues_hint: A workload can only contain queues from the same channel. Once assigned, the workload channel cannot be changed. It can only be updated by creating a new workload.
new.exporter_hint: The workload history for today and yesterday will be exported to WFM periodically, into a dedicated queue named '*{{ workloadName }}'.
new.exporter_hint_styled: injixo will automatically create a queue with the same name as your workload but starting with an asterisk (*). You must select this queue when you configure staff calculation methods.

warnings.staff_requirements_mismatch: Your configuration differs from the settings you selected for the staff requirements under the calculation method.

business_hours_association.explanation: Take the business hours of the planning unit and the activity into account when calculating the forecast. Volumes outside of the business hours are redistributed within the business hours. The Forecast will need some time to adapt to this change.
business_hours_association.label: Business hours
business_hours_association.hint: To enable this option you have to select a planning unit and an activity in the basic configuration section.

calculation_models.explanation_basic:
Basic Forecast uses an algorithm based on average values of historical data. The forecast is calculated once a week.
Update in 2023: All Basic Forecast workloads will be upgraded to Smart Forecast workloads.
calculation_models.explanation_smart: Smart Forecast selects the algorithm for the most accurate forecast based on machine learning. A new forecast is generated every time your historical data is updated. Try Smart Forecast for free with Smart Forecast (Test mode).
calculation_models.label: Forecast model
calculation_models.hint: Note that selecting the Basic Forecast deactivates features that are only available with the Smart Forecast option.
calculation_models.explanation_basic_classic: Basic Forecast uses an algorithm based on average values of historical data. The forecast is calculated once a week. Try the more accurate Smart Forecast.

pricing_model.explanation_live: Live mode enables the full injixo Forecast functionality for this workload. It will be charged monthly. Note that a workload cannot be changed back to Test mode or Basic Forecast once it is set live.
pricing_model.explanation_test: Test mode workloads are not charged, but functionality is restricted. They are for evaluation purposes only. Note that a workload cannot be changed back to Test mode or Basic Forecast once it is set live.
pricing_model.label: Pricing model

pu_activity.explanation:
By selecting a planning unit and activity, you can display your business hours in the forecast graph. Planning units and activities are subjects of user permissions- Please contact your administrator if you cannot find an element in the selection fields.
Note: If a planning unit is assigned a planning calendar, you also need this permission to display the business hours (they are only visible in the day view).

history_starting_time_field.explanation: Choose a start date for the historical data that should be taken in consideraton for the Forecast calculations. All data before that date will be excluded for the calculations. Otherwise the calculation takes the first date of history as a default.
history_starting_time_field.label: Historical data consideration start date

queues.no_queues_hint: Historical data will be imported every 15 minutes.
queues.save_modal_header: Use this forecast to calculate staff requirements

save_info.failure_text: Unable to transfer the Volume and AHT data. The target queue or value type does not exist. Add the value type to the queue. If the queue was deleted, create the workload again.
save_info.overwriting_hint: Your existing volume and AHT data for this time frame will be overwritten.
save_info.what: Save this forecast to use other calculation methods than Erlang-C.
save_info.legacy_what: Transfer the Forecast to ForecastPro to use an alternative staff requirement calculation method. It will be provided as version "Auto-Forecast".

mode.description_test: This workload is currently in Test mode. To use all functionalities of injixo Forecast, switch this workload to Live mode. Live workloads are billed additionally. You cannot switch a Live workload back to Test mode.

queues.save_triggered: Save is in progress. Your Forecast will be available in WFM in a few minutes.

delete.text: All historical and forecasted data will be deleted permanently.

queues.selected_from_deleted_integration_hint: Inactive queues are imported from integrations that have since been deleted and will not receive data any longer.

setup_page.body_text:
To use injixo Forecast, you first need to create a workload. Workloads are the heart of your forecast.
They contain all your historical data and related forecasts. Without them, no forecast can be generated.
To create a workload, your ACD must be correctly connected, and imported queues must be available.

body_text.done:
You can now create a workload.
It might take a while until the historical data is available for the forecast.
body_text.initial: As soon as there are queues available, you can start creating a workload.

body_text.done:
There are queues available.
injixo will continue importing queues regularly.
body_text.initial: To import queues, you first need to connect your ACD to injixo.
body_text.pending:
Your queues are being imported.
It might take a while until the queues are available.

import_queues_card.heading: 2. Import queues
import_queues_card.import_error_message: The queues could not be imported. <IntegrationStatusLink>Check your integration status</IntegrationStatusLink>.

body_text.done:
The ACD is connected.
The queues are imported automatically.
body_text.initial: To start using Forecast, you first need to connect your ACD to injixo.

assigned_events.assign_event_hint: Events can only be assigned to a single day at a time.
assigned_events.deleted: Event or outage deleted. The forecast is being updated.
assigned_events.empty_state_message: There are no events in the time range you selected.

errors.event_deletion_failed: The event could not be deleted.
errors.outage_deletion_failed: The outage could not be deleted.

assigned_events.headline: Manage events
assigned_events.success: Event or outage added. The forecast is being updated.

chart_empty.subtitle: Try adjusting the time range.

unsaved-changes.description: Your changes will not be saved.

planning-unit-and-activity.label:
Select a planning unit and activity to display business hours
and set it as the default target for staff requirements.

discard-selected-queues.description: You are about to change the channel or interval. Any selected queues in the current channel and interval will be discarded.
discard-selected-queues.title: Unassign selected queues?

unassign-all-queues.description: <para>You are about to unassign the queues. This action will cease the utilization of historical data by the workload. It will happen:</para><list><item>Historical data will no longer be displayed</item><item>Auto-forecast data will be deleted</item></list>
unassign-all-queues.title: Stop using historical data

inline-message.immutable-channel-and-interval: You cannot change the channel or interval after creating the workload.
